languages.text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} near an enemy affected by the Sworn Enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the Warrior gains +{uip|TemporaryWounds|8b1920f555924a0dbe5caa88129061f0} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}воин{/g} завершает свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} рядом с противником, на которого действует {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Заклятый враг, воин получает +{uip|TemporaryWounds|8b1920f555924a0dbe5caa88129061f0} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.

traits.locale_text: When the Fighter ends their turn near an enemy affected by the Sworn Enemy ability, the Fighter gains 2+(Fighter's TOU Bonus)/2 Temporary Wounds.
When the Fighter ends their turn near an enemy affected by the Sworn Enemy ability, the Fighter gains 2+(Fighter's TGH Bonus)/2 Temporary Wounds.
When the Fighter ends their turn near an enemy affected by the Sworn Enemy ability, the Fighter gains 2+(Fighter's TGH Bonus)/2 Temporary Wounds.

When the Fighter ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} near an enemy affected by the Sworn Enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the Fighter gains +{uip|TemporaryWounds|8b1920f555924a0dbe5caa88129061f0} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}воин{/g} завершает свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} рядом с противником, на которого действует {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Заклятый враг, воин получает +{uip|TemporaryWounds|8b1920f555924a0dbe5caa88129061f0} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} near an enemy affected by the Sworn Enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the Warrior gains +{uip|TemporaryWounds|8b1920f555924a0dbe5caa88129061f0} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда воин завершает свой ход рядом с противником, на которого действует способность Заклятый враг, воин получает 2+(бонус ВЫН воина)/2 временного здоровья.
Когда воин завершает свой ход рядом с противником, на которого действует способность Заклятый враг, воин получает 2+(бонус ВЫН воина)/2 временного здоровья.

Когда воин завершает свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} рядом с противником, на которого действует {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Заклятый враг, воин получает {uip|TemporaryWounds|8b1920f555924a0dbe5caa88129061f0} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}在受到不共戴天{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响的敌人周围结束{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，可获得{uip|TemporaryWounds|8b1920f555924a0dbe5caa88129061f0}点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}。
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} near an enemy affected by the Sworn Enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the Warrior gains +{uip|TemporaryWounds|8b1920f555924a0dbe5caa88129061f0} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当战士在受到不共戴天{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响的敌人周围结束{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，可获得（2+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/2）点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}。
当战士在受到不共戴天{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响的敌人周围结束{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，可获得{uip|TemporaryWounds|8b1920f555924a0dbe5caa88129061f0}点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}。

languages.text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g} finalice su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} junto a un enemigo afectado por la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Enemigo jurado, gana +{uip|TemporaryWounds|8b1920f555924a0dbe5caa88129061f0} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} near an enemy affected by the Sworn Enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the Warrior gains +{uip|TemporaryWounds|8b1920f555924a0dbe5caa88129061f0} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el guerrero finalice su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} junto a un enemigo afectado por la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Enemigo jurado, gana +{uip|TemporaryWounds|8b1920f555924a0dbe5caa88129061f0} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.

Cuando el guerrero finalice su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} junto a un enemigo afectado por la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Enemigo jurado, gana +{uip|TemporaryWounds|8b1920f555924a0dbe5caa88129061f0} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g} seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} in der Nähe eines Feindes beendet, der von der {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Todfeind betroffen ist, erhält der Krieger +{uip|TemporaryWounds|8b1920f555924a0dbe5caa88129061f0} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} near an enemy affected by the Sworn Enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the Warrior gains +{uip|TemporaryWounds|8b1920f555924a0dbe5caa88129061f0} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Krieger seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} in der Nähe eines Feindes beendet, der von der {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Todfeind betroffen ist, erhält der Krieger +{uip|TemporaryWounds|8b1920f555924a0dbe5caa88129061f0} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}.

Wenn der Kämpfer seine {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} in der Nähe eines Gegners beendet, der von der {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Todfeind betroffen ist, erhält der Kämpfer +{uip|TemporaryWounds|8b1920f555924a0dbe5caa88129061f0} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}.

languages.text: Lorsque le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Combattant{/g} termine son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} à proximité d'un ennemi sous l'effet de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Ennemi juré, il gagne +{uip|TemporaryWounds|8b1920f555924a0dbe5caa88129061f0} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} near an enemy affected by the Sworn Enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the Warrior gains +{uip|TemporaryWounds|8b1920f555924a0dbe5caa88129061f0} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le Combattant termine son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} à proximité d'un ennemi sous l'effet de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Ennemi juré, il gagne +(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}.

Lorsque le Combattant termine son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} à proximité d'un ennemi sous l'effet de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Ennemi juré, il gagne +{uip|TemporaryWounds|8b1920f555924a0dbe5caa88129061f0} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}宿敵の効果を受けた敵の近くで{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を終了した時、{uip|TemporaryWounds|8b1920f555924a0dbe5caa88129061f0}の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} near an enemy affected by the Sworn Enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the Warrior gains +{uip|TemporaryWounds|8b1920f555924a0dbe5caa88129061f0} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ファイターが{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}宿敵の効果を受けた敵の近くで{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を終了した時、(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} / 2)の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を得る。
ファイターが{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}宿敵の効果を受けた敵の近くで{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を終了した時、{uip|TemporaryWounds|8b1920f555924a0dbe5caa88129061f0}の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を得る。
